title: Ep 151 | Jase Admits He Was Wrong, the Top 10 Duck Dynasty DED List & the Celeb Instagram Blackout
description:
Jase unveils his Top 10 "Duck Dynasty" Don't-Ever-Do List. Phil warns against any Supreme Court nominee or candidate who comes to us in sheep's clothing. In a landmark Unashamed moment, Jase admits he was wrong. Phil nails celebrity culture in one Bible verse and learns about Instagram. Jase knocks the 24-hour celebrity Instagram blackout to protest hate speech. And Phil, Jase, and Zach discuss supposed "scientific evidence" that Trump has harmed the country and how to understand the Father, the Son, and the Holy Spirit.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
